price: 93. Yallak kalah aqbudak sugteenim Yallih digaalák sin cattaa hinnay is isi nafsi Yallih digaalák cattaa?
arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ هَلۡ يَنصُرُونَكُمۡ أَوۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: min dūni al-lahi hal yanṣurūnakum aw yantaṣirūna
